loan_maturity1.in_log_status:
Please be advised, the borrower for 189 Candlewood Path is 90 or more days delinquent – our Legal Team has been engaged to begin the foreclosure process. Our office is simultaneously pursuing alternative forms of recovery which may include any of the following resolutions:


a. Identifying a buyer for the property – this may result in the mortgage being assumed and completed by a new borrower OR an outright payoff of our mortgage by the purchaser;

b. Identifying a buyer for our mortgage loan – we regularly work with Non-Performing Loan buyers (“NPL Buyers”). We may consider contacting our NPL Buyers to purchase this position;

c. Negotiating a Deed In Lieu of Foreclosure – while unlikely, some borrowers have opted to turn over the deed to the property in lieu of foreclosure. In return, we would be releasing the guarantor from further liability. 

d. Identifying a partner for the borrower – we may reach out to other borrowers from our database in an effort to negotiate a partnership between the parties and bring the project back on track.


Please contact us at investors@sharestates.com if you have any questions.

Thank you for being a valued investor with Sharestates.

loan_maturity1.attorney: Rice Pugatch Robinson Storfer & Cohen, PLLC

loan_maturity1.in_log_status:
Please be advised, the borrower for 104 Santa Clara Trail is delinquent – our Legal Team has been engaged to begin the foreclosure process. Our office is simultaneously pursuing alternative forms of recovery which may include any of the following resolutions:
a. Identifying a buyer for the property – this may result in the mortgage being assumed and completed by a new borrower OR an outright payoff of our mortgage by the purchaser;
b. Identifying a buyer for our mortgage loan – we regularly work with Non-Performing Loan buyers (“NPL Buyers”). We may consider contacting our NPL Buyers to purchase this position;
c. Negotiating a Deed In Lieu of Foreclosure – while unlikely, some borrowers have opted to turn over the deed to the property in lieu of foreclosure. In return, we would be releasing the guarantor from further liability. 
d. Identifying a partner for the borrower – we may reach out to other borrowers from our database in an effort to negotiate a partnership between the parties and bring the project back on track.

As we go through this process, we will continue to send you progress updates. Please contact us at investors@sharestates.com if you have any questions.

Thank you for being a valued investor with Sharestates.

loan_maturity1.in_log_status:
Please be advised, the property for 929 Kirby Drive has officially been sold for a sale price of $2,332,500.00. Net of fees and legal costs, the total amount being disbursed amongst investors will be $2,152,336.64 (10.32% principal loss). Based off the original loan amount of $2,400,000.00, you will receive a disbursement based off of your loan participation rate. Please expect distributions to take place on or before Tuesday, May 28, 2019. An itemization of fees and legal costs are outlined below.

Sale Price $2,332,500.00

Fees
Recording Fees $24.00
Delinquent Property Taxes $61,393.02
Doc Preparation Deed/Corp Resolutions $225.00
HOA Current Balance $2,551.64
HOA Transfer Fee $250.00
Real Estate Commission - Listing $34,987.50
Real Estate Commission - Selling $46,650.00
Reimbursement for Entity Status $10.00
Closing/Settlement Fee $475.00
Tax Certificate $77.00
E-Recording $4.00
Option Fee $600.00
Fee Title Insurance Paid on behalf of purchaser $11,937.00
2019 Est Prop Taxes 1/1/19-4/30/19 $17,861.95
Foreclosure Search Fee $150.00
Locksmith  Invoice $182.94
Foreclosure Attorney (Spector & Johnson, PLLC) Fees $5,593.53
HOA Resale Certificate to Buyer - GF 1987839-ALGA $500.00

Additions
Wire Overage of Funds Refund $394.96
Commonwealth of Pennsylvania - Over payment from Closing Refund $1,243.00
HOA Adjustment paid by Seller 5/1/19-1231/19 $1,671.26

Total Disbursement Amount $2,152,336.64

Additionally, Sharestates will pursue the borrower under their Personal Guarantee for additional principal loss recoveries. The timeline is estimated to take 6-12 additional months. 

If we experience issues or further delays, we will notify you as soon as possible. Please contact us at investors@sharestates.com if you have any questions.
 
Thank you for being a valued investor with Sharestates!
